pages.text: $(li)The Sunflower Plains are a variant of the Plains biome.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)In this place you can find flowers like Sunflowers, Buttercups and Cornflowers.$(br)$(li)Hummingbirds can be found flying around here pollinating the flowers of this biome.
$(li)You can search this biome introducing the words $(l)Sunflower Plains$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
